page.title: 14Religion
page.content: Most people in the area have a real or nominal allegience to the{Church of {Scotland}which has charges at Melville -South,Inchbrayoch(Ferryden),the Old Church with its Chapel of Ease at Lochside and St Andrews Church.All of these churches,with the exception of the Old Church, are the result of unions and linkages. Other bodies are represented by the Congregationalists,Baptists,Christian Brethren,Methodists,United Free,Roman Catholic,Scottish Episcopal,Assemblies of God and Pentecostalists. Sects such as Mormans and Jehovah's Witnesses also funtion in{Montrose. }
